A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lame from beginning to end\, too many characters\, you never get to care for any of them\, way too many cameos (R2D2\, Chewacca\, etc)\, McGuffins flashed before your eyes that are quickly torn down\, etc. Additionally\, the movie reuses and overuses tropes like fliying thru a pit from previous episodes.... a total\, utter\, boring mess of a movie. Do not watch\, you would be wasting your time.
